UDLAConfigParams.QueryStatement: SELECT TOP <Max_Message_Count> [MsgID], C.[Name] AS CommonEvent, C.[CommonEventID] AS CommonEventID, B.[Name] AS Classification, [Msg], [MsgDate], [NormalMsgDate], [Priority], [Direction], [SHostID], D.[Name] AS SHostName, [DHostID] , E.[Name] AS DHostName, [SPort], [DPort], [ProtocolID], [Subject], [DateInserted], [Session], [BytesIn], [BytesOut], [ItemsIn], [ItemsOut], [Duration], [Amount], [Quantity], [Rate], [Size], [SNameID], [DNameID], F.[User] AS [LoginID], G.[User] AS [AccountID], [SenderID], [RecipientID], [ObjectID], H.VendorMsgIdentifier AS VendorMsgIdentifierID, [GroupID], [DomainID], [ProcessID], [URLID], [SNetworkID], [DNetworkID], A.[EntityID], A.[RiskRating], [FalseAlarmRating], [SMAC_ID], [DMAC_ID], [SNATIP], [DNATIP], [SInterfaceID], [DInterfaceID], [PID], [SeverityID], [VersionID], [CommandID], [ObjectNameID], [SNATPort], [DNATPort], [ActionID], [CVEID], [DomainOrigin], [Hash], [ObjectTypeID], [ParentProcessId], [ParentProcessNameID], [ParentProcessPathID], [PolicyID], [Reason], [ResponseCodeID], [ResultID], [SerialNumberID], [SessionTypeID], [StatusID], [ThreatId], [ThreatName], [UserAgent], [VendorInfo], [UserOriginIdentityID], [UserImpactedIdentityID], [SenderIdentityID], [RecipientIdentityID] FROM [LogRhythm_Events].[dbo].[Msg] A INNER JOIN [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[MsgClass] B ON A.MsgClassID = B.MsgClassID INNER JOIN [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[CommonEvent] C ON A.CommonEventID = C.CommonEventID LEFT JOIN [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Host] D ON A.SHostID = D.HostID LEFT JOIN [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Host] E ON A.DHostID = E.HostID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[User] F ON A.AccountID = F.UserID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[User] G ON A.LoginID = G.UserID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[VendorMsgIdentifier] H ON H.VendorMsgIdentifierID = A.VendorMsgIdentifierID WHERE MsgSourceID IN (-1000001,-1000002,-1000003,-1000004,-1000005)
